item.title: Residential
item.description: Gated communities, apartment and condo complexes, and other residential living communities share some of the same common threats. The greatest security threats include property theft and burglary, break-ins, vandalism, assaults and loitering. Alarm systems and electronic gates are sound security measures; however, they do have their limitations. An effective residential security program should include on-site, professional security guards. The guards at SGFM understand the most pressing threats against a residential community and its residents.

item.title: Commercial
item.description: Businesses across the nation are facing growing security challenges. High-tech cameras and security systems cannot replace the human element that business security companies can provide. For over 25 years, companies of all sizes and across all industries have trusted SGFM team to handle their commercial security needs. When a situation arises, our clients can feel confident that the issue will be treated with professionalism by our team of qualified security officers.

item.title: Industrial
item.description: Industrial sites are some of the largest targets of theft and vandalism in the country. No matter the size or scope of your industry, the potential financial risks of theft and vandalism are high. The side effects of these crimes are much more than just property loss – they can have a serious impact on your ability to complete the job on time and on budget. At SGFM, we partner with clients in the multiple industries to provide experienced security guards who understand the intricacies of large industries.

item.title: Events & Exhibitions
item.description: When you are planning an event, you need a security company that you can trust. SGFM is the leading event security company in the AP and Telangana, with over 10 years of experience and some of the most skilled guards available in the industry. Backed by our impeccable reputation for quality and affordability, we provide reliable protection for events of any type and size. We have experience supporting the security efforts for a wide variety of events, including: sporting events, award shows, public government meetings, celebrity appearances, location filming, corporate conferences, business meetings, grand openings, concerts, festivals, and private parties.

item.title: Parking & Traffic
item.description: Parking lots are vulnerable to all sorts of crimes and illegal activity. It is not uncommon to hear stories of employees being robbed when they leave the office late at night, or vehicles being broken into while residents sleep. When people are on your property, you want them to feel safe and secure. Not only is this good for the reputation of your business, it’s good business all around. Security doesn’t start once you enter the front door of your business.

item.title: Hospitals & Banks
item.description: Hospital Security Services At SGFM, we specialize in providing professional, reliable security protection for hospitals and other healthcare facilities. With over 10 years of experience, our security authorities recognize the risks hospitals face. We work with highly-trained leaders and law enforcement partners who are equipped to handle your security needs. When you think of a hospital, the concepts of safety, health and healing might come to mind. The doctors, nurses and other health professionals that walk the corridors tend to patients and ensure that the facility runs smoothly.
